synopsis.text:
She's a high school student with a mission that's far from ordinary: Tamaki Suzuhara navigates the dark world of illegal organ trafficking in Japan, where the demand for high-quality transplants has spiraled out of control. As underground organizations resort to kidnapping and murder to obtain organs for sale, even some surgeons have been lured into this illicit trade, expanding their operations overseas.

Tamaki is not just another player in this morally questionable network; she's on a personal quest to find someone dear to her who has mysteriously vanished. As she delves deeper into this dangerous world, she targets criminals deemed 'morally curable' for organ harvesting, grappling with her own moral dilemmas along the way.

Join Tamaki on her blood-soaked journey, as she balances her search for her missing loved one with her role in this sinister underworld. Will she find what she's looking for, or will she become another casualty in this ruthless game? Find out in this thrilling anime, exclusively available on Anime Beans, a vertical anime streaming app by Production IG.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
